definitions.body: a royal city of northern Canaan Jos 11:1 ´[[יׇבִין מֶלֶח־ח]], cf. Jos 12:19, and Ju Jdg 4:2, Jdg 4:17, 1Sa 12:9; Jos 11:10, Jos 11:10, Jos 11:11, Jos 11:13, Jos 19:36, 2Ki 15:29; [[חָחׂר]] 1Ki 9:15.
[[חָחוֹר]] Ne 11:33 a Benjamite town, prob. = [[בַּעַל חָחוֹר]] q.v.
[[מַמְלְכוֹת חָחוֹר אֲשֶׂר הִכָּה נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּו֠ר]] Je 49:28, cf. v:Je 49:30, v:Je 49:33, an Arabian locality, v. Winer:BW Hazor Gf Gie.—´[[עֵין ח]] Jos 19:37, v. sub [[עַיִן]].
